description.english: Sneak a peek at Kayleigh, but not very good at it yet

description.english: Sleep is life. Alarm clocks? Never heard of 'em!
description.schinese: 睡眠已成为人生使命，闹钟？不存在的
description.french: Dormir, c'est la vie. Les réveils ? Connais pas
description.japanese: 睡眠こそ人生。目覚まし？何それ？
description.brazilian: Dormir é vida. Despertador? Nunca ouvi falar!
description.latam: Dormir es vida. ¿Despertadores? Ni idea!

description.english: Please be sure to respect Emma's privacy!

description.brazilian: Respeite a privacidade da Emma!
description.latam: Respetar la privacidad de Emma!
